Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits mandatory arbitration agreements in consumer and employment contracts; repealer
Summary: Prohibits mandatory arbitration agreements in consumer and employment contracts; repeals existing provisions prohibiting mandatory arbitration clauses in certain consumer contracts.
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง399-c, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibited mandatory arbitration agreements; and to repeal section 399-c of such law relating to prohibiting mandatory arbitration clauses in certain consumer contracts
